1.title: The Missing Showgirl
1.plot: Debbie Flores Narvaez moves to Las Vegas to follow her dream of becoming a showgirl. Her career is taking off and she meets the perfect guy when she falls for a Cirque du Soleil performer - but after landing a solo in the acclaimed burlesque show "Fantasy" her body is found cut up and encased in cement.

2.title: Hollywood Horror
2.plot: Linda Sobek is a swimsuit model and former LA Raiders cheerleader who goes missing after a desert photo shoot and just before a wardrobe fitting for comedic series Married with Children. Police must uncover a twisted trail of clues that lead to a killer who claimed her death was accidental - though physical evidence suggests something far more sinister.

3.title: Fallen Starlet
3.plot: Rebecca Schaeffer is an aspiring actress who bursts onto the scene with a starring role in the hit sitcom My Sister Sam. However, fame comes with a price and just hours before her audition for Godfather III, she is found shot on her LA doorstep. Who could have wanted this rising star dead? The killer left few clues behind and investigators must unlock the secrets of a puzzling crime scene to catch him.

4.title: Nashville Nightmare
4.plot: Melissa Haferman is an aspiring country singer on the verge of a recording contract. She goes missing after traveling to Nashville to record a demo and is found strangled to death with her own rodeo belt. Evidence leads to a man who eliminated the rising star to boost his own twisted thirst for fame.

5.title: Fatal Audition
5.plot: Karin Schlegel beats hundreds to win the starring role in a feature film with an up-and-coming New York City director. Before the movie begins shooting, she gets another big gig - an opportunity to model for a national print ad. She goes to the shoot - and vanishes. When her body turns up nude on top of an apartment building, the police investigation reveals a psychologically twisted killer and a nightmare that shakes the Big Apple to its core.

6.title: Hunted in Hollywood
6.plot: Jane King is dying to be an actress. In the process of going to auditions, getting head-shots and attending acting classes she meets a man who claims to have connections with a major studio. But the claim is a lie and weeks later police find her body. The circumstances of her murder are eerily similar to other recent homicides in LA - and it takes two years and many more victims to bring the infamous Hillside Stranglers to justice.
